coffee.description: Coffee Availability is Diminishing Due to Global Warming
Fairtrade cannot solve the issue of climate change, but we do support farmers with tools, practices and resources to become more resilient

cow.description: The agriculture sector is one of the world’s biggest sources of climate-altering gases.
Cows release methane, and methane traps roughly 30 times more heat than carbon dioxide

beef.description: The agriculture sector is one of the world’s biggest sources of climate-altering gases.
Cows realease methane, and methane traps roughly 30 times more heat than carbon dioxide

composting.description: Composting enhances environmental resilience and climate adaptation by promoting plant growth, stabilizing soils, and reducing the impact of flooding and droughts.
America throws out immense amounts or trash, most of which is dumped into landfills or burned in trash incinerators.

plastic.description: Pacific garbage patch has an area twice the size of Texas or three times the size of France
Plastic generate heat-trapping gases at every stage of their life cycle.

biodegradable.description: Bioplastic might not be biodegradable, and biodegradable plastic might not be bioplastic.
Biodegradable plastic needs conditional enviorment to degrade.

reusable.description: With every item you recycle or reuse, you help reduce greenhouse gases and protect the climate.
Every disposable plastic bag that ends up in the ocean or countryside is a danger to fish, birds and mammals. Use reusable bags.

recycle.description: Waste prevention and recycling decrease the need to extract "virgin" resources from forests, oil reserves and mines, to make products and packaging.
Recycling helps reduce greenhouse gas emissions by reducing energy consumption.
